title: Armed group kills seven police officers in northern Burkina Faso - Reuters
description: Unidentified assailants killed seven police officers and wounded five more in northern Burkina Faso on Friday morning, the government said in a statement.
content:
OUAGADOUGOU, Nov 12 (Reuters) - Unidentified assailants killed seven police officers and wounded five more in northern Burkina Faso on Friday morning, the government said in a statement.
The officer… [+563 chars]
source.name: Reuters

title: Gunfight and siege in Kenya as police foil bank robbery - Reuters
description: Kenyan police firing automatic rifles and pistols laid siege to gunmen trying to rob a bank in the western city of Kisumu on Tuesday, foiling a heist but failing to prevent the assailants' escape after the five-hour confrontation.
content: KISUMU, Kenya, Nov 23 (Reuters) - Kenyan police firing automatic rifles and pistols laid siege to gunmen trying to rob a bank in the western city of Kisumu on Tuesday, foiling a heist but failing to … [+1118 chars]
source.name: Reuters

title: Freight train derailed and burned in southern Chile amid indigenous conflict - Reuters
description: A freight train in southern Chile was derailed and some of its cargo units burned by unknown assailants on Tuesday, officials said, amid tensions between the state and the local Mapuche indigenous group demanding the return of ancestral lands.
content: SANTIAGO, Nov 2 (Reuters) - A freight train in southern Chile was derailed and some of its cargo units burned by unknown assailants on Tuesday, officials said, amid tensions between the state and the… [+1205 chars]
source.name: Reuters

title: Two Israeli police officers stabbed, Palestinian assailant killed - police - Reuters
description: A 16-year-old Palestinian stabbed two Israeli police officers in Jerusalem's walled Old City on Wednesday before he was shot and killed by security forces at the scene, police said.
content: JERUSALEM, Nov 17 (Reuters) - A 16-year-old Palestinian stabbed two Israeli police officers in Jerusalem's walled Old City on Wednesday before he was shot and killed by security forces at the scene, … [+778 chars]
source.name: Reuters

title: Thieves rip bitcoin ATM from Barcelona crypto-store - Reuters
description: Spanish police are investigating the robbery of a 'bitcoin ATM' in a raid on a cryptocurrency exchange outlet in a wealthy Barcelona neighbourhood, local media reported on Friday.

title: Congo army says it has driven rebels out of eastern villages - Reuters
description: Democratic Republic of Congo's army said on Monday it had recovered two strategic villages near the eastern border with Uganda after they were seized overnight by fighters from the M23 rebel group.
